argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Returns TRUE if the programmatic identifier had a license key.

argument.name: ProgID
argument.description: The software's programmatic identifier. See OLE Automation Object Browser.

page.description: Remove a license key for an ActiveX control previously stored using AddLicense.
page.discussion: The OLE.RemoveLicense() method removes a programmatic identifier and its associated license key from the global cache.
page.example: ? ole.addlicense("a", "lic1") = .T. ? ole.getlicense("a") = "lic1" ? ole.loaddeveloperlicense("b") ERROR: OLE: No license found for 'b' ? ole.removelicense("a") = .T. ? ole.getlicense("a") ERROR: OLE: No license found for 'a'
